noAlert.description:
Description

Disallow the use ofalert,confirm, andprompt.
JavaScriptâ€™salert,confirm, andpromptfunctions are widely considered to be obtrusive
as UI elements and should be replaced by a more appropriate custom UI implementation.
Furthermore,alertis often used while debugging code, which should be removed before
deployment to production.
noAlert.option: This rule has no specific options.
